Blog Desdemona, the witch whose evil is only matched by her power, threatens to destroy the Romanian and Serbian packs. The powerful males that would stand against her, including the Alphas, Vasile and Decebel, are trapped in the In Between enduring living nightmares and suffering beyond what any human is capable. If they can't escape soon, they will be driven mad, and their wolves will become feral, overtaking the human's ability to control them once and for all. Peri, the ever-courageous high fae, leads a contingent of female wolves through the rough Carpathian Mountains, searching for a way to break the seal Desdemona has placed upon the veils to the fey realm. If she doesn't, victory against Desdemona will be out of reach. Finally, the high fae council has realized they've sat on the sidelines for far too long. They've sent representatives to the far corners of the globe, meeting with the pack Alphas. The fey must convince the Alphas of every pack to lay aside their petty territorial squabbles and battles of dominance and join the fight against Desdemona if they are to have any chance for survival.
